abilities.description: When you personally @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.eece9a67d1961f70]{Repair} a vehicle, or direct those repairs, take 1 extra repair point or +1 momentum on a hit.

You may @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} (+wits) by studying the construction or configuration of an enemy vessel. On a strong hit, you spot a vulnerability or a means of overcoming its advantages; envision what you learn, and take +2 momentum. Then, one time only, you or an ally may reroll any dice when using this insight to make a move.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.703964b8d02355b8]{Resupply} by repurposing parts or materials from a ship or wreck, reroll any challenge dice. On a strong hit with a match, you may reclaim a capability of that ship. If you do, take a free module or support vehicle asset, or gain one free upgrade to an existing module or vehicle.
